reviewText: This is a good video. Could use additional camera angles and slower motions to illustrate the techniques.
Grandmaster Samuel Kwok is my Sifu's (Phillip Nearing) Sifu. Sam is a super down to earth and very detail oriented instructor. This book, like his seminars, are full of great material. Good stuff
Great video, comprehensive and well done! Grand Master Kwok is amazing and the techniques are thoroughly taught.  A great tool for learning and review of Chi Sao, well worth the money invested.
Wow! I enjoyed the program and it was worth watching. I would recommend this for the next person that is into Wing Chun Kung-Fu.
